org.openscience.cdk.tools

Interface IValencyChecker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDKValencyChecker, SaturationChecker, SmilesValencyChecker

    public interface IValencyChecker
    A common interface for SaturationChecker and ValencyChecker. Mainly created to be able to have HydrogenAdder use both.
    Author:
    Egon Willighagen
    Created on:
    2004-01-08
    Belongs to CDK module:
    valencycheck
